sx.blah.discord.handle.obj

Interface IUser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    User

    public interface IUser
    This class defines the Discord user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAvatar()
      Gets the user's avatar id.
      String getAvatarURL()
      Gets the user's avatar direct link.
      String getDiscriminator()
      Gets the discriminator for the user.
      Optional<String> getGame()
      Gets the game the user is playing, no value if the user isn't playing a game.
      String getID()
      Gets the user's unique id.
      String getName()
      Gets the user's username.
      Presences getPresence()
      Gets the user's presence.
      List<IRole> getRolesForGuild(String guildID)
      Gets the roles the user is a part of.
      String mention()
      Formats a string to @mention the user.

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        String getID()
        Gets the user's unique id.
        Returns:
        The user's id.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Gets the user's username.
        Returns:
        The username.

      • getGame

        Optional<String> getGame()
        Gets the game the user is playing, no value if the user isn't playing a game.
        Returns:
        The game.

      • getAvatar

        String getAvatar()
        Gets the user's avatar id.
        Returns:
        The avatar id.

      • getAvatarURL

        String getAvatarURL()
        Gets the user's avatar direct link.
        Returns:
        The avatar url.

      • getPresence

        Presences getPresence()
        Gets the user's presence.
        Returns:
        The user's presence.

      • mention

        String mention()
        Formats a string to @mention the user.
        Returns:
        The formatted string.

      • getDiscriminator

        String getDiscriminator()
        Gets the discriminator for the user. This is used by Discord to differentiate between two users with the same name.
        Returns:
        The discriminator.

      • getRolesForGuild

        List<IRole> getRolesForGuild(String guildID)
        Gets the roles the user is a part of.
        Parameters:
        guildID - The guild id to check the roles for.
        Returns:
        The roles.
